search.search_err_length: Search query must be more than 3 characters

repeat.repeat_msg_begin: Please select the Verse that you want to start from
repeat.repeat_msg_end: Please select the Verse that you want to stop the Telawah at
repeat.repeat_notifyAway: Please quit repeating mode - by stopping it - to be able to browse other pages

Ayat_err.err_fnf_tarjama: Sorry , You need to download the required translation
Ayat_err.err_fnf_tafsir: Sorry , You need to download the required tafsir
Ayat_err.err_fnf_audio: Sorry , You need to download the required audio file
Ayat_err.err_fnf_img: Sorry , You need to download the required image file

Ayat_update.upd_avail: There is a new version available and it's stongly recommended to update now
Ayat_update.upd_avail_must: There is a new version available and you must download it to proceed
Ayat_update.upd_failed: Sorry , Failed to download the new version
Ayat_update.upd_patched: Updater has successfully made some updates to the content

Ayat_help.hlp_p10: Ayat is the desktop version of the KSU Holy Quran project , which offers all the online version features without the need of internet connection
Ayat_help.hlp_p20: To be able to use the program without internet connection you have first to download the required content (recitations audio files, images files (scanned quran pages) , translations files) on your PC , there are three methods to download the contents :
Ayat_help.hlp_p30: download the content via download panel (at the left of the screen) which enables you to download recitations audio files, images files and translations files.
Ayat_help.hlp_p60: download patch files containing the required content , these patches are available at the program's website.
Ayat_help.hlp_p70: download on demand - the program will try to download missed contents and cache it to be available for offline usage, for example if you tried to listen to Surat Al-Faatiha the program will try to download required audio files and cahce it.
Ayat_help.hlp_p75: for further help please visit the program's website
Ayat_help.hlp_p90: special thanks to King Fahd Complex for the Printing of the Holy Qur'an (source of Quran images files) , Tanzil.net (source of Quran text and translations) , mosshaf.com (source of Tafasir (explanations)) and Verse by Verse Quran (source of recitations audio files).
